scripts.clean!: npm run reset && npm run clean
scripts.clean!!: npm run reset! && npm run clean
scripts.ds_store: find . -iname "*.DS_Store" -exec git rm {} \;; find . -iname "*er i konflikt*" -exec git rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.DS_Store" -exec rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.docx" -exec rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.log" -exec rm {} \;
scripts.build: npm run browser && npm run jsdoc
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run minify && cp -r doc web && cp -r test web
scripts.lint: jshint index.js src/album.js src/artist.js src/auth.js src/csv.js src/generator.js src/http.js src/lastfm.js src/playlist.js src/parser.js src/queue.js src/scraper.js src/similar.js src/sort.js src/spotify.js src/top.js src/track.js src/util.js web/web.js test/test.js && standard index.js src/album.js src/artist.js src/auth.js src/csv.js src/generator.js src/http.js src/lastfm.js src/playlist.js src/parser.js src/queue.js src/scraper.js src/similar.js src/sort.js src/spotify.js src/top.js src/track.js src/util.js web/web.js test/test.js
scripts.tests: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.http: npm run start && npm run server
scripts.browser: browserify web/web.js -o web/bundle.js && browserify test/test.js -o test/bundle.js
scripts.web: npm run browser && npm run open
scripts.builddoc: npm run jsdoc && npm run doc
scripts.jsdoc: rm -rf doc && jsdoc -c .jsdocrc -d doc README.md index.js src/album.js src/artist.js src/auth.js src/csv.js src/generator.js src/http.js src/lastfm.js src/playlist.js src/parser.js src/queue.js src/scraper.js src/similar.js src/sort.js src/spotify.js src/top.js src/track.js src/util.js
scripts.commit: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a -m "Updated `git status | sed -n '/modified:/ {s/^[[:space:]]*modified:[[:space:]]*//;s/\.txt$//;s/\.md$//;s/\.html$//;s/\/index$//;p;q;}'`"
scripts.amend: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend --no-edit
scripts.reword: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend
scripts.reset!: npm run reset && npm run clear
scripts.push: git --no-pager status && git pull --rebase && git push
